text: Pietro Grosso (; December 23, 1923 – October 3, 1957) was an Italian professional footballer who played as a midfielder. ==Club career== Gross played for 11 seasons (337 games, 1 goal) in the Italian Serie A with Vicenza Calcio, U.S. Triestina Calcio, A.C. Milan, A.S. Roma and A.C. Torino. ==International career== Gross made his Italy national football team debut on 25 November 1951 in a game against Switzerland. ==External links== * Category:1923 births Category:1957 deaths Category:Italian footballers Category:Italy international footballers Category:Serie A players Category:A.C.D.
